snippet.title: Resident Evil Revelations 2- First Trailer
snippet.description:
Continuing the series legacy of delivering the essential survival horror experience, Resident Evil Revelations 2 promises all new horrors, terrifying locations and dramatic twists and turns.

Visit residentevil.com for more screens and information.
